TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardEventArgs ^ e);
type KeyboardEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyboardEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。
Docs.summary: 表示将处理键盘相关路由事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]没有现有的<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>键盘事件使用委托。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler><xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>使用基类作为其事件数据类。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>用作更具体<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>的和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>事件数据类的基类。 这些事件数据类由<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>委托使用，而这些委托<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>由现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件（例如和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>）使用。
